catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 350
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: landscape with mountains and tany trees at left; man on horse with attendant, LLC; man on boat at right; buildings and water; seven-line inscription in black and two red seals, ULC; tan paper backing; on back, URC:  N.V. Hammer Far Eastern Art sticker
inscription: 8th month, autumn, year of Shinshi [1812] | Poem on left screen: (Old trails follow cliffs into the blue sky; / Trees are frosted, leaves fallen, and the westerly wind is blowing. / I ride my horse alone on a barren road / When autumn is about to end. / The setting sun glows over a million valleys that hold crimson colors of the autumn season. / Shunkin Kisen.)
markings: Shinsen no In |Both: Shunkin Koji | Right: Ganha Toho
medium: Ink and light color on silk
object_name: Six-panel folding screen, one of a pair (left)
title: Autumn Landscape
